title: Rune Thoughts
body:
1. I think that mana flow should not trigger when a champion passive or ability would result in mana being already restored/refunded.

2. I dont really like the runes when it comes to jungling (mainly i dont feel like i can get a notable reward for killing (or in ivern's case freeing) monsters.

3. At some point maybe before worlds or the next pre-season RIOT could introduce a new rune category (a 6th) that provides runes that initially didnt make the cut. (Like a rune category for jungleing or so)
